body_html:
Wrapping that tensor in a variable isn't sufficient to fix the problem. I tried that and get the error:

  File "//anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/sparse.py", line 212, in forward
    )(self.weight, input, offsets)
  File "//anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/sparse.py", line 147, in forward
    assert indices.dim() == 1
AssertionError

Presumably the 2d input needs to be flattened somehow before passing it to the backend.

body:
Wrapping that tensor in a variable isn't sufficient to fix the problem.  I tried that and get the error: 

```
  File "//anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/sparse.py", line 212, in forward
    )(self.weight, input, offsets)
  File "//anaconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/sparse.py", line 147, in forward
    assert indices.dim() == 1
AssertionError
```
Presumably the 2d input needs to be flattened somehow before passing it to the backend.
